author: Rajan Sapkota
title: Problem Set 11 Question 4 Check-expect
question:
Shouldn't TA -> TI number of routes be 9 instead of 3?
Here are all the routes I found in addition to the original three:
TA -> TC -> TG -> TD -> TI
TA -> TC -> TG -> TD -> TH -> TI
TA -> TC -> TG -> TD -> TH -> TJ -> TI
TA -> TB -> TF -> TC -> TG -> TD -> TI
TA -> TB -> TF -> TC -> TG -> TD -> TH -> TI
TA -> TB -> TF -> TC -> TG -> TD -> TH -> TJ -> TI
student_answer: You want the number of treasures that have a direct path to TI. There are 3: TD, TH, TJ.
